about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, Transvoy Logistics India Limited is engaged in the business of integrated logistics solutions. The company offers services like NVOCC, Freight Forwarding, Custom Clearance, Transportation handling, and Advisory on MEIS License Trading.

Transvoy Logistics India operates primarily in India along with expanding to different parts of the world including Sri Lanka, China, Malaysia, Middle East, and Singapore. They maintain highest quality in the service and strive at satisfying the requirements of the customers.

The customers of the company are catered in the following horizons-

  1. Freight Forwarding
  2. Customs Clearance
  3. Allied Logistics and Transportation Services

Transvoy also operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary Aashirvad Shipping & Allied Private Limited (ASAPL) which offers custom clearing services. Recently, Transvoy Logistics India Limited formed another company in Singapore with the name Transvoy Logistics PTE. Ltd engaged in the non-vessel owning common carrier (NVOCC) services.

faqs.question: What is the Transvoy Logistics India IPO?
faqs.answer:
Transvoy Logistics India IPO is a SME IPO of 720000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.11 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹71 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on January 20, 2023, and closes on January 24, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Transvoy Logistics India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Transvoy Logistics India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Transvoy Logistics India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Transvoy Logistics India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Transvoy Logistics India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Transvoy Logistics India IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Transvoy Logistics India IPO opens on January 20, 2023 and closes on January 24, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Transvoy Logistics India IPO?
faqs.answer: Transvoy Logistics India IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,13,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Transvoy Logistics India IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Transvoy Logistics India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Transvoy Logistics India IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Transvoy Logistics India IPO will be done on Monday, January 30, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, February 1, 2023. Check the Transvoy Logistics India IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Transvoy Logistics India IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Transvoy Logistics India IPO listing date is on Thursday, February 2, 2023.
